column2: "O' Shadow, darker than the great Abyss. Become my power and swallow those who dare to defy me, PHANTOM..."
"Night has fallen, and so shall you..."
"Whoa! You took them out like blablablam! Blink once and you'd miss it! So this is the new Phantom class!"
"But what was up with that stuff you were mumbling while you were fighting?"
"It kind of felt like you were giving them a chance to escape. Was all of that necessary...?"
"Of course it was."
"Upon reaching their ears, my \"Aria\" renders them immobile with fear, and guides them to their impending death..."
"This \"Aria\" of mine... It is required in order to strike down my enemies with certainty."
"Sure, but don't you do it just because it sounds cool?"
"P-Patty! You can't just say that!"
"Utter foolishness. The \"Aria\" is an absolute necessity... As far as I am concerned."
"Mhmm, I see. So Phantoms have to say an aria when they do their fancy finishing moves."
"I didn't really understand any of it, but it sure sounded cool! Teach me about how Phantoms fight!"
"What are you saying, you idiot! You're gonna make Kyokuya mad..."
"...Very well."
"Really?!"
"Phantom is a class that fights without relying on foolish notions such as \"justice\"."
"Think only about eliminating your enemy. Pay no heed to the light, to justice, or your methods. Fear not the power of darkness."
"...Especially you, Guardian. Were an ARKS of your caliber to become a spirit..."

"It would give even the most reckless and
\"justice\"-blinded fool pause for thought."
"...Hmph. The spirits have spoken a bit too much... Farewell."
"Yes, yes! I wanna recite a cool \"Aria\" too! Oh \"One who is dressed in darkness\"...!"
"They're not dressed to impress. Something like \"One who is cloaked in darkness\" would sound much cooler..."
"...But enough about all that. What did you think of our interview with the Phantom representative, Patty?"
"The eleventh class, shrouded in a fog of mystery. They weaponize the \"Aria\", and do whatever it takes in battle. That is the nature of the new Phantom class..."
"You're so impressionable..."
